summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5943 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 39, A. A. Denny's 6th Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue and Western Avenue, from Lenora Street to Blanchard Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 78934, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
